feed.title: Tetsa River (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WEATHER WARNING IN EFFECT, Tetsa River (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:59 PM PDT Friday 27 May 2016

entry.title: Friday night: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Rain except snow near the summit. Amount 5 to 10 mm except 20 mm over eastern sections. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 10:01 PM PDT Friday 27 May 2016

entry.title: Saturday: Snow or rain. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow late in the morning. Snow near the summit in the morning. Rainfall amount 10 mm. Snowfall amount 10 cm except 20 cm over higher terrain. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 10:01 PM PDT Friday 27 May 2016

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 10:01 PM PDT Friday 27 May 2016

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of snow or rain. High 7. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of snow or rain. High 7. Forecast issued 10:01 PM PDT Friday 27 May 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 10:01 PM PDT Friday 27 May 2016

entry.title: Monday: Cloudy. High 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High 10. Forecast issued 10:01 PM PDT Friday 27 May 2016

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 10:01 PM PDT Friday 27 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday: Cloudy. High 18.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High 18. Forecast issued 10:01 PM PDT Friday 27 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 10:01 PM PDT Friday 27 May 2016

entry.summary: Sunny. High 22. Forecast issued 10:01 PM PDT Friday 27 May 2016

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low 7.

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 23.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High 23. Forecast issued 10:01 PM PDT Friday 27 May 2016
